input.label: Site
input.populatingSearch: | inputlookup SPSite | search NOT ServerRelativeUrl="/my/*" | table Id,Url | sort Url

chart.title: Document Views over Time
chart.searchString: eventtype=mssharepoint-audit ItemType=1 Event=3 SiteId="$Url$" $Document$ | timechart count

table.title: Document Views by User
table.searchString: eventtype=mssharepoint-audit ItemType=1 Event=3 SiteId="$Url$" $Document$ | stats latest(_time) as _time by src_user | table _time, src_user | eval modUsername=replace(src_user,"\\\\","\\\\") | rename src_user as Username | sort _time

table.title: Document Updates by User
table.searchString: eventtype=mssharepoint-audit ItemType=1 (Event=2 OR Event=4 OR Event=5 OR Event=10 OR Event=14) SiteId="$Url$" $Document$ | table _time, src_user | eval modUsername=replace(src_user,"\\\\","\\\\") | rename src_user as Username | sort _time

table.title: Users who have not read Document
table.searchString: | inputlookup SPUser | lookup SPWeb Id as WebId OUTPUT SiteId | where SiteId="$Url$" | join type=outer src_user [search eventtype=mssharepoint-audit SiteId="$Url$" $Document$ | stats latest(_time) as tt by src_user] | where isnull(tt) | table src_user,DisplayName | lookup SPSystemAccounts src_user OUTPUT isSystemAccount | where isnull(isSystemAccount) | eval modUsername=replace(src_user,"\\\\","\\\\") | sort src_user | rename src_user as Username
